Using Drafts

Joe Buhlig

setups

Drafts is one of those apps that I cannot go without. The funny thing is that my tech-resistant wife is now dependent on it as well. And you can be sure that I am pretty excited about her use of it.

When you have a tool as powerful as OmniFocus, it’s easy to get lost in all the details. But adopting someone else’s structure rarely works as a pure copy-paste. You have to understand how you work and then apply that to your setup.

My Omnifocus Setup and Workflow
Jul 4, 2014
Joe Buhlig
apps
gtd
omnifocus
setups

OmniFocus is a powerful tool designed to follow David Allen’s Getting Things Done. I go into the details of GTD here but the simple version is that it’s a method of getting things out of your mind and into a trusted organizational system. The main purpose is to free up your mind to have ideas, not hold them.

Every week I pull together everything I've created online, share my recently discovered books, occasionally offer promos and discounts on apps, and mention some of my favorite articles from the week.

One last step... Click on the link in the email you just received and you're all done!
